attributes.title: this app is the WORST
attributes.review: it’s so hard to use, I can’t understand what the point of this app is? It’s like it’s trying to spread fascism or become a dictator or something. 🤔 Apple needs to get rid of this app ASAP, it’s unusable and a travesty to humanity and technology 💞🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.title: Absolute Propaganda!
attributes.review: I opened the app and was greeted by so much fake news I could’ve thought I downloaded the CNN app. However, I was thoroughly disappointed to find that Trump actually has his own app in the first place.

attributes.title: Creepy and terrible
attributes.review: I opened the app to support my favorite pedo I mean president and I got deported for being my cousin’s dog’s sister’s mother’s grandmother and I was so terrified so I decided to hop off the app and my phone started glitching and automatically started playing “Deep Throat” by Cupcake. Unacceptable😞

attributes.title: THIS APP IS A SCAM
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and all of a sudden my bank account only had 6 dollars!!!!! I was so mad, My friends and I both are dealing with the same issue! If this problem continues I might sue🌚🔪 and my pet doggy barks when ever he sees Donald’s face! Don’t ban tiktok for us!

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: This app was literally disgusting it made my eyes bulged out of my socket because the was a Cheeto on the cover of the app and it was absolutely horrendous it was so terrifying I couldn’t sleep at night because the Cheeto had a horrible tan and it’s eyes were so yellow it was horrific.

attributes.title: FISH KILLER!!!!!!!
attributes.review: i downloaded this app to support the amazing orange, but I GOT A CREEPY ORANGE! i did not sign up for this, i am HEATED. do you know what it’s like to get played like that?! I BET YOU DONT! i was on the app and all of a sudden my fish died, i blame it all on this app. i got the dumbest orange there is and i’m so upset about it, RIP MY FISH!

attributes.title: this app killed my dad
attributes.review: my dad hated trump but one day he was walking his fish to wendy’s when he noticed that the government out this app on his phone. he got so distracted by why this had happened when an ambulance hit him. he died soon after. DO NOT DOWNLOAD.

attributes.title: FAKE App! Don’t Download
attributes.review: Fake news alert. I don’t think this is an official Trump app. So fake. Really really fake. Many many lies. I also think this app is spying on me. My phone acts strange since downloading. Slowed down and battery drained. I think this was developed by liberals. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!

attributes.title: Glitch
attributes.review: My phone worked prefectures fine and then I got the app and it glitches out. The app would never load and the app glitches out many times too.

attributes.title: Dump Trump
attributes.review: When the entire world makes fun of you. When you believe in drinking bleach. When you are racist and sexist. When you cannot strong sentences together. That’s when you’ll know American is great again?
